thread.title: World’s heaviest woman loses 50 kilos in 12 days
thread.title_full: World’s heaviest woman loses 50 kilos in 12 days

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE
title: World’s heaviest woman loses 50 kilos in 12 days
text:
Eman Ahmed who weighs 500 kilograms hadn't moved from her bed for the past 25 years before she came to Mumbai for the operation. (Photo: AFP) Mumbai: The world’s heaviest woman Eman Ahmed has lost 50 kilograms in the last 12 days. The woman who landed in Mumbai on Feb 11 has been undergoing a weight reduction program after she was reported to have weighed 500 kilograms in December last year.
The 36-year-old Egyptian lady was transported in a custom made aircraft by Egypt Air. The woman hadn’t moved out of her house for the last 25 years before she was admitted to Saifee Hospital under the care of Dr. Muffazal Lakdawala and his team of doctors. The woman from Alexandria is currently undergoing treatment for sleep apnea, hypothyroid, diabetes, hypertension, kidney problems, fluid retention and mainly obesity.
The Egyptian will have a first surgery in the next two weeks and the doctors need her to reduce enough weight so that she can enter the operation theatre. Eman is almost 151 cm wide but can now lift herself up with some help which was impossible before. The doctors say she is improving by “leaps and bounds”.
